text: nissandeh us ghadee ka gyaan allaah hee ke paas hai. vahee menh barasaata hai aur jaanata hai jo kuchh garbhaashayon mein hota hai. koee kyakti nahin jaanata ki kal vah kya kamaega aur koee vyakti nahin jaanata hai ki kis bhoobhaag mein usak mrtyu hogee. nissandeh allaah jaananevaala, khabar rakhanevaala hai
